UseNotifyAllInsteadOfNotify.description:
Description

Thread.notify() awakens a thread monitoring the object. If more than one thread is monitoring, then only
one is chosen.  The thread chosen is arbitrary; thus itâ€™s usually safer to call notifyAll() instead.

UseNotifyAllInsteadOfNotify.option: This rule has no specific options.
